price: Abosomsomfoͻ no nni ho kwan sε wͻsra anaasε wͻyε Nyankopͻn Nyame-dan (Ka’aba) no ho adwuma aberε a wͻdi wͻn ara wͻn ho adanseε sε wͻwͻ boniayε mu. Saa nkorͻfoͻ no na wͻn nnwuma ayε kwa, na Ogya no mu na wͻbεtena.
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ أَن يَعۡمُرُواْ مَسَٰجِدَ ٱللَّهِ شَٰهِدِينَ عَلَىٰٓ أَنفُسِهِم بِٱلۡكُفۡرِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ حَبِطَتۡ أَعۡمَٰلُهُمۡ وَفِي ٱلنَّارِ هُمۡ خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: mā kāna lil'mush'rikīna an yaʿmurū masājida al-lahi shāhidīna ʿalā anfusihim bil-kuf'ri ulāika ḥabiṭat aʿmāluhum wafī al-nāri hum khālidūna
